title: Best of The Herd for Jun 11, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jun 11, 2020
description:
Athletes like Patrick Mahomes and LeBron James can get things done that politicians can't

The numbers are telling you that Baker Mayfield is the issue for the Browns

Colin is tired of NBA stars who repeatedly do not deliver in the playoffs

People only hate Sam Darnold because Colin likes him

The NFL's biggest nightmare is about to happen


Guest: Dwight Freeney, 7x Pro Bowler & Super Bowl Champion

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
